nodes.text: Rilly Raadun was a female Force Adept, who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

In 31 BBY, Raadun attended the SoroSuub Anniversary celebration that was held in the city of Tolea Biqua, on the planet Genarius. During the event, Raadun served as an agent of the Force Adept Taleah Novran, who was trying to pair young Force Adepts with suitable mentors.
Raadun was very energetic and capable of carrying out many different tasks simultaneously. She was also very kind and friendly, and would care and feed those who she felt needed her help.
